.top-bar-section
.top-bar
.medium-12
#masthead
Special Event Space
Immediately adjacent to our St. Petersburg brewery is our barrel aging room and beer garden, which we commonly reserve and transform into fantastic event venues for small and mid-sized groups.
.entry-header
.large-12
.row
A Space For Almost Any Occasion
Our indoor and outdoor spaces are very versatile, and are great for a
        variety of purposes:
Weddings
Wedding Receptions
When it comes to your special day, no St. Pete wedding venue is more
          flexible and accommodating than the special event spaces at Pinellas
          Ale Works. Newlyweds can celebrate comfortably alongside family and
          friends, all while enjoying the unique and fun atmosphere of our
          brewery. Scroll to the form on the bottom of this page to send us a message.
Learn more
Clubs
Clubs and Social Groups
From meetup groups to homebrew clubs, we have the space for you. Event
          attendees can grab a beer, play some cornhole and giant Jenga, or sit
          and socialize comfortably among some of our finest barrel-aged brews.
          Whatever your group needs, we will find a way to deliver for you. 
          Scroll to the form on the bottom of this page to send us a message.
Learn more
Corporate
Corporate Meetings and Parties
Holiday parties and group presentations are second nature to us. Our
          barrel aging room comfortably fits up to 50 meeting attendees or can
          be modified into an exciting social environment for colleagues and
          professional groups to chat over some award-winning beers. We have a
          projector and a large screen perfect for slide shows, home movies, or
          powerpoint presentations. Business meetings are always more fun at
          PAW. Scroll to the form on the bottom of this page to send us a message.
Learn more
Family and Friend
Family and Friend Events
Birthday parties and family reunions alike, your group will feel at
          home at our brewery, and you won’t have to worry about a thing. Our
          family-friendly atmosphere makes a great space for people of all ages,
          while our flagship beers will keep your drinking-aged guests
          refreshed. Scroll to the form on the bottom of this page to send us a message.
Learn more
Our Private Event Spaces
Our customers find that our event spaces are unique alternatives to
        banquet halls and hotels, and provide greater flexibility and a more
        comfortable atmosphere for their guests. Scroll to the form on the bottom of this page to send us a message.
        Along with 30+ taps of PAW beer, we offer red and white wine, hard cider,
        and bottled soft drinks and water. Scroll to the form on the bottom of 
        this page to send us a message.
Indoor and Outdoor Event Spaces
Indoor Barrel Aging Room
Our barrel aging room is a large fully heated and air-conditioned
          indoor space, which we find to be the best room for most of our events
          at PAW. Featuring seating room for up to 50 guests, a glass garage
          door that opens as overflow capacity into the beer garden, three (3)
          dedicated bathrooms, and a dedicated side entrance, this space can be
          reserved specifically for you and your guests. We also offer a private bar in our event room where you can have your own private bartender catering to your event. Scroll to the form on the bottom of this page to send us a message.
Wi-Fi and Audio-Visual equipment available.
Outdoor Beer Garden
With a much larger guest capacity, our beer garden is great for events
          with over 50 people, or people looking to add an outdoor vibe to their
          event. With all the same amenities and features as the indoor barrel
          aging room, the beer garden can set up based on your desires. Whether
          you’re going for a fun feel, with patio games and a food truck, or a
          more formal feel with a dance floor and live music, our staff can help
          accommodate your needs. Scroll to the form on the bottom of this page to send us a message.
Pricing
It is our goal to provide a unique and affordable private event space in
        downtown St. Pete. Pricing is divided into two fees:
Space Reservation Fee
Our event spaces are reserved for a 3 hour minimum at the following
          rates:
Weekday Rate – $175 per hour (Monday through Thursday)
Weekend Rate – $225 per hour (Friday through Sunday)
Please note that you can reserve a space without a drink package.
Tab Options
You can choose one of the following tab plans:
Individual – Separate tab per guest
Group – Single tab for a preset number of drinks (drink tickets)
Open Bar – Single tab for unlimited drinks (wristbands provided)
An 20% gratuity will be added to the final bill
.entry-content
.entry-footer
.large-12
.row
#post-##
VR View modal for the barrel aging room
×
Indoor Barrel Aging Room
VR View modal for the beer garden

        comfortable atmosphere for their guests. Scroll to the form on the bottom of this page to send us a message.
        Along with 30+ taps of PAW beer, we offer red and white wine, hard cider,
        and bottled soft drinks and water. Scroll to the form on the bottom of 
        this page to send us a message.
Indoor and Outdoor Event Spaces
Indoor Barrel Aging Room
Our barrel aging room is a large fully heated and air-conditioned
          indoor space, which we find to be the best room for most of our events
          at PAW. Featuring seating room for up to 50 guests, a glass garage
          door that opens as overflow capacity into the beer garden, three (3)
          dedicated bathrooms, and a dedicated side entrance, this space can be
          reserved specifically for you and your guests. We also offer a private bar in our event room where you can have your own private bartender catering to your event. Scroll to the form on the bottom of this page to send us a message.
Wi-Fi and Audio-Visual equipment available.
Outdoor Beer Garden
With a much larger guest capacity, our beer garden is great for events
          with over 50 people, or people looking to add an outdoor vibe to their
          event. With all the same amenities and features as the indoor barrel
          aging room, the beer garden can set up based on your desires. Whether
          you’re going for a fun feel, with patio games and a food truck, or a
          more formal feel with a dance floor and live music, our staff can help
          accommodate your needs. Scroll to the form on the bottom of this page to send us a message.
Pricing
It is our goal to provide a unique and affordable private event space in
        downtown St. Pete. Pricing is divided into two fees:
Space Reservation Fee
Our event spaces are reserved for a 3 hour minimum at the following
          rates:
Weekday Rate – $175 per hour (Monday through Thursday)
Weekend Rate – $225 per hour (Friday through Sunday)
Please note that you can reserve a space without a drink package.
Tab Options
You can choose one of the following tab plans:
Individual – Separate tab per guest
Group – Single tab for a preset number of drinks (drink tickets)
Open Bar – Single tab for unlimited drinks (wristbands provided)
An 20% gratuity will be added to the final bill
.entry-content
.entry-footer
.large-12
.row
A Space For Almost Any Occasion
Our indoor and outdoor spaces are very versatile, and are great for a
        variety of purposes:
Weddings
Wedding Receptions
When it comes to your special day, no St. Pete wedding venue is more
          flexible and accommodating than the special event spaces at Pinellas
          Ale Works. Newlyweds can celebrate comfortably alongside family and
          friends, all while enjoying the unique and fun atmosphere of our
          brewery. Scroll to the form on the bottom of this page to send us a message.
Learn more
Clubs
Clubs and Social Groups
From meetup groups to homebrew clubs, we have the space for you. Event
          attendees can grab a beer, play some cornhole and giant Jenga, or sit
          and socialize comfortably among some of our finest barrel-aged brews.
          Whatever your group needs, we will find a way to deliver for you. 
          Scroll to the form on the bottom of this page to send us a message.
Learn more
Corporate
Corporate Meetings and Parties
Holiday parties and group presentations are second nature to us. Our
          barrel aging room comfortably fits up to 50 meeting attendees or can
          be modified into an exciting social environment for colleagues and
          professional groups to chat over some award-winning beers. We have a
          projector and a large screen perfect for slide shows, home movies, or
          powerpoint presentations. Business meetings are always more fun at
          PAW. Scroll to the form on the bottom of this page to send us a message.
Learn more
Family and Friend
Family and Friend Events
Birthday parties and family reunions alike, your group will feel at
          home at our brewery, and you won’t have to worry about a thing. Our
          family-friendly atmosphere makes a great space for people of all ages,
          while our flagship beers will keep your drinking-aged guests
          refreshed. Scroll to the form on the bottom of this page to send us a message.
Learn more
Our Private Event Spaces
Our customers find that our event spaces are unique alternatives to
        banquet halls and hotels, and provide greater flexibility and a more
        comfortable atmosphere for their guests. Scroll to the form on the bottom of this page to send us a message.
        Along with 30+ taps of PAW beer, we offer red and white wine, hard cider,
        and bottled soft drinks and water. Scroll to the form on the bottom of 
        this page to send us a message.

About Our Beers
.entry-header
We pride ourselves on the quality and diversity of the craft beers we brew at Pinellas Ale Works and will always strive to meet the highest of standards. We take our craft seriously and know that the care and attention we put into our brewing practices shows in the end product. PAW beers have racked up multiple awards including 13 medals in the Best Florida Beer Competition, and even a Great American Beer Festival Silver medal for Milk Bone Sweet Stout!
We have more taps than a dog has toes – more than
30 in our tasting room
. They consist of PAW’s core brands and a rotating selection of pilot batches of experimental craft beers, keg treatments, seasonal offerings and (typically) one hard cider.
Visit us today.
Beer-to-go in the PAW tap room:
1/6 & 1/2 bbl Kegs
16, 19.2 & 32 oz Crowlers
32 & 64 oz Growlers
1888 Russian Imperial Stout – 22 oz bottles
Barrel Aged 1888 Russian Imperial Stout – 22 oz bottles
16 oz 4 Packs of select PAW beers
12 oz 6 Packs of select PAW beers
A variety of select 22oz bottles also available in the tap room!
Beer Descriptions
Here are just a few of our award-winning brews available in the tap room:
1888 – Russian Imperial Stout
2017/ 2021/ 2022 Best Florida Beer Competition: Gold Medal “Sweet/ Strong Stout”
2018 & 2023 Best Florida Beer Competition: Silver Medal “
Sweet/ Strong Stout”
2020 Best Florida Beer Competition: Bronze Medal “
Sweet/ Strong Stout”
10.5% ABV | 108 IBU | 110 SRM
June 8
th
1888
, the day in which the first train pulled into the last stop in southern Pinellas County. That train arrived carrying empty freight cars and one passenger on the railroad built by Peter Demens. Eventually, the city that arose around that stop was named after his birthplace of St. Petersburg, Russia. To honor the arrival of that first train we present this beer which boasts bold roast barley, chocolate, toffee, dark fruit and coffee flavors big enough to satisfy even the most demanding aristocrats.
Milk Bone – Sweet Stout
2017 Great American Beer Festival: Silver Medal
5% ABV | 25 IBU | 45 SRM
One of our best sellers since we’ve opened. This milk stout (AKA sweet stout) is brewed with lactose in the boil which gives a residual sweetness and medium mouthfeel. You will notice notes of chocolate, coffee and slight toffee in the aroma and flavor. If you like café con leche, you’ll love Milk Bone!
Harold’s – St Pete Style Lager
5% ABV | 27 IBU | 3.5 SRM
The ode to our building’s namesake is our go-to, easy drinking beer for any occasion. ‘Harold’ used to run an auto body repair shop where we now brew our beer. If he was still around, we’re sure this would be his favorite beer. Loosely based on the German Kolsch style, we use a proprietary fermentation process to produce a flavorful beer that finishes smooth and clean. Pilsner base malt provides a pleasant malt backbone and the German Hallertauer hops balance out the sweetness with a slight herbal note. This beer is a favorite around the brewery due to its simplicity and approachability! Watch for special treatments on tap in the Tasting Room, including Strawberry/Banana, Peach, and Coffee Harold’s.
Piddle Pils – Pilsner
4.9% ABV | 39 IBU | 3 SRM
This beer is our take on the German Pilsner style. It’s slightly more flavorful and hop forward than our Harold’s lager. Our exclusive “St Pete Style” fermenting and lagering process makes this beer smooth and sessionable, but never boring.
Price’s Horchata – Cinnamon/ Vanilla Rice Ale
2020 Best Florida Beer Competition: Gold Medal “Herb/ Spice Beer
“
5.8% ABV |  20 IBU | 3 SRM
Why Price’s Horchata? First off, Price is our long time friend and home brewer and he’s responsible for the recipe behind this delicious beer. It’s a unique beer that uses rice and barley malt in the grist, lactose in the boil, and loads of vanilla beans and cinnamon sticks in the fermenter. Hop additions are kept to a minimum to let the spices shine. The result is a light and refreshing brew akin to it’s ancient roots. This is a seasonal offering.
Sit – Amber Ale
5.3% ABV | 29 IBU | 15 SRM
When we wrote the recipe for this beer, our goal was not to create another IPA in a different color, but to offer a sessionable beer balanced more on the malty side. We use “citrusy” American hops in moderation so the malt can come through. Sit!… and enjoy.
Chill Hill – IPA
4.9% ABV | 40 IBU | 5 SRM
The little brother of Thrill Hill! Being a bit more restrained in maltiness and ABV, you can’t beat beers like this for day drinking, so kick back and enjoy the chill ride with this brew.
Puppy Love – New England Style IPA
7% ABV |  0 IBU | 4 SRM
We love these New England style IPAs for their big juicy flavor, in your face hop aroma and we love them for their low bitterness turbidity. We brew our Puppy Love with our favorite combo of jucifiers and hazifiers! We hope you love drinking Puppy Love as much as we love making it.
Off The Leash – American IPA
7% ABV | 50 IBU | 8 SRM
Our goal with this American IPA is balance. We use loads of hops for big hop aroma and flavor, but also just enough malt to balance out the bitterness. We don’t believe, “he who dies with the highest IBU’s (International Bittering Units) wins.”
Thrill Hill – Double IPA
2020 Best Florida Beer Competition: Bronze Medal “Imperial IPA
“
8.4% ABV |  82 IBU | 6 SRM
This over the top Double IPA is named after a famous St Pete “Hill” and it is a hop lover’s dream. It’s light in color but big and bold in flavor. To achieve the big juicy hop flavor, we load up the whirlpool with lots of Chinook hops. The big hop nose comes from dry hopping with lots of American and New Zealand hops. The slightly sweet malt takes a back seat letting the hop flavors shine and a dryer finish leaves a pleasant bitterness that begs for another sip. Yes, tons of hops were sacrificed in the making of this beer, but we think you’ll agree, it was worth it. When your mouth is ready for a thrill, order a Thrill Hill.
PAW Festbier – Oktoberfest
2024 Best Florida Beer Oktoberfest Competition: Bronze Medal
5.7% ABV | 28 IBU | 9 SRM
This malty copper colored beer is brewed in Germany during the summer and released for the Fall Oktoberfest celebration. Here at PAW, we love this style so much, we’ve been known to brew it year round. Winter, Spring, Summer or Fall, come raise a pint of PAW Festbier. Prost!
Smoke Dog – Smoked Red Ale
2020 & 2025 Best Florida Beer Competition: Silver Medal “Smoked Beer
“
6% ABV |  21 IBU | 16 SRM
Smoke Dog is a malty Red Ale brewed with just the right amount of German Beechwood Smoked malt. Some people say it tastes like bacon.. how can you beat that!
Aberdeen – Scotch Ale
9.4% ABV | 53 IBU | 25 SRM
Named after one of our furry friends, the Aberdeen Terrier, Aberdeen Scotch Ale is a full-bodied Ale with a very creamy mouthfeel. It is packed full of flavors that range from dried fruits and caramel to light biscuit undertones. With all those flavors coming through, this beer definitely doesn’t let you forget that it is, in fact, a very malt forward beer that’s balanced and not overwhelming.
Pomeranian Porter – Baltic Porter
8.5% ABV | 49 IBU | 35 SRM
Sometimes known as Palmeranian, this is our St. Pete interpretation of a European beer. Pomeranian Porter is a bold and robust Baltic-style Porter. At first, you’ll notice notes of nuts, toffee, figs, and licorice all backed by a very nice medium carbonation and a subtle dry finish.
Schwarzhound – German Black Lager
2019 Best Florida Beer Competition: Gold Medal “
European Lager”
2023 Best Florida Beer
Oktoberfest Open
: Gold Medal “Dark
European Lager”
5% ABV | 25 IBU | 28 SRM
Don’t be afraid of the dark. Unlike most black beers, like American Stouts which tend to be more roasty and bitter, this German-style Schwarzbier is very balanced and sessionable. Subtle hints of unsweetened chocolate and coffee keep it interesting, and restrained bittering hop additions keep the balance in check. Schwarzhound is all bark and no bite!
Stay
5.2% ABV | 0 IBU
Typically the first command you teach to every young puppy. If you appreciate Craft Beer but have never tried ours, this would be a good beer to start with. Lots of late kettle additions and plenty of dry hoping provide huge American hop flavor and a wonderful fruity and slightly floral aroma. Don’t be fooled into thinking all that hop goodness will leave a bitter mess in your mouth, this beer is balanced, finishes clean and crisp and is a joy to quaff. So be good, Stay.
So what are you waiting for? Come
visit us
, and try a flight of beers in our tasting room.
Looking for fresh, local, award winning Craft Beer for your bar or restaurant? Contact  (727)235-0970 or email manager@pawbeer.com

.entry-footer

Our goal with this American IPA is balance. We use loads of hops for big hop aroma and flavor, but also just enough malt to balance out the bitterness. We don’t believe, “he who dies with the highest IBU’s (International Bittering Units) wins.”
Thrill Hill – Double IPA
2020 Best Florida Beer Competition: Bronze Medal “Imperial IPA
“
8.4% ABV |  82 IBU | 6 SRM
This over the top Double IPA is named after a famous St Pete “Hill” and it is a hop lover’s dream. It’s light in color but big and bold in flavor. To achieve the big juicy hop flavor, we load up the whirlpool with lots of Chinook hops. The big hop nose comes from dry hopping with lots of American and New Zealand hops. The slightly sweet malt takes a back seat letting the hop flavors shine and a dryer finish leaves a pleasant bitterness that begs for another sip. Yes, tons of hops were sacrificed in the making of this beer, but we think you’ll agree, it was worth it. When your mouth is ready for a thrill, order a Thrill Hill.
PAW Festbier – Oktoberfest
2024 Best Florida Beer Oktoberfest Competition: Bronze Medal
5.7% ABV | 28 IBU | 9 SRM
This malty copper colored beer is brewed in Germany during the summer and released for the Fall Oktoberfest celebration. Here at PAW, we love this style so much, we’ve been known to brew it year round. Winter, Spring, Summer or Fall, come raise a pint of PAW Festbier. Prost!
Smoke Dog – Smoked Red Ale
2020 & 2025 Best Florida Beer Competition: Silver Medal “Smoked Beer
“
6% ABV |  21 IBU | 16 SRM
Smoke Dog is a malty Red Ale brewed with just the right amount of German Beechwood Smoked malt. Some people say it tastes like bacon.. how can you beat that!
Aberdeen – Scotch Ale
9.4% ABV | 53 IBU | 25 SRM
Named after one of our furry friends, the Aberdeen Terrier, Aberdeen Scotch Ale is a full-bodied Ale with a very creamy mouthfeel. It is packed full of flavors that range from dried fruits and caramel to light biscuit undertones. With all those flavors coming through, this beer definitely doesn’t let you forget that it is, in fact, a very malt forward beer that’s balanced and not overwhelming.
Pomeranian Porter – Baltic Porter
8.5% ABV | 49 IBU | 35 SRM
Sometimes known as Palmeranian, this is our St. Pete interpretation of a European beer. Pomeranian Porter is a bold and robust Baltic-style Porter. At first, you’ll notice notes of nuts, toffee, figs, and licorice all backed by a very nice medium carbonation and a subtle dry finish.
Schwarzhound – German Black Lager
2019 Best Florida Beer Competition: Gold Medal “
European Lager”
2023 Best Florida Beer
Oktoberfest Open
: Gold Medal “Dark
European Lager”
5% ABV | 25 IBU | 28 SRM
Don’t be afraid of the dark. Unlike most black beers, like American Stouts which tend to be more roasty and bitter, this German-style Schwarzbier is very balanced and sessionable. Subtle hints of unsweetened chocolate and coffee keep it interesting, and restrained bittering hop additions keep the balance in check. Schwarzhound is all bark and no bite!
Stay
5.2% ABV | 0 IBU
Typically the first command you teach to every young puppy. If you appreciate Craft Beer but have never tried ours, this would be a good beer to start with. Lots of late kettle additions and plenty of dry hoping provide huge American hop flavor and a wonderful fruity and slightly floral aroma. Don’t be fooled into thinking all that hop goodness will leave a bitter mess in your mouth, this beer is balanced, finishes clean and crisp and is a joy to quaff. So be good, Stay.
So what are you waiting for? Come
visit us
, and try a flight of beers in our tasting room.
Looking for fresh, local, award winning Craft Beer for your bar or restaurant? Contact  (727)235-0970 or email manager@pawbeer.com
